about_the_game:
Welcome to the World of Elementals

Step into the ancient kingdom of Elementals, a land where the forces of nature once thrived in harmony, guided by the five legendary Guardians. These powerful beings—Infernus, Frostia, Terram, Aerius, and Umbra—kept balance in the realm, each mastering an elemental force: heat, cold, nature, wind, and light and shadow, respectively.

The Fall of the Guardians

Tragedy struck when dark magic corrupted the Guardians' souls. A malevolent force took control, twisting the once benevolent protectors into destructive monsters. Once nurturers of peace, the Guardians now ravage the lands they swore to protect. The world of Elementalium has fallen into chaos, and the serenity it once knew is now a distant memory.

Gameplay Features

  • Unique Abilities: Discover and harness 12 distinct abilities, two from each corrupted Guardian. These powers will aid you in your quest to restore balance.
  • Dual-Wield Magic: Unleash the full potential of your magic by using both hands simultaneously. Combine and amplify your elemental powers for more devastating effects.
  • Altar Activation: To restore any of the ancient altars, you must wield the corresponding elemental ability. Master these skills to bring harmony back to the world.

Embark on Your Quest

As the chosen hero, it's up to you to reclaim the Guardians' powers and restore order to the shattered kingdom. Will you have the strength and wisdom to overcome the corrupted forces and revive the ancient altars? The fate of Elementalium rests in your hands.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 or equivalent
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: The world has plunged into chaos after the altars were deactivated. As the chosen hero, only you can restore balance by taking the unique abilities from the Guardians. Harness their powers to bring harmony back to the shattered world and revive the altars!
